text: Michael Angelis (January 18, 1942 - May 30, 2020) was a British actor. He was best known for his roles in Boys from the Black Stuff and G.B.H.. He was the narrator of the British children's television series Thomas and Friends from 1991 to 2012. He was born in Liverpool, England. He died on May 30, 2020 of a heart attack, aged 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2020 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:1944 births Category:Paddington actors
title: Michael Angelis
